review_comment: Unmatched view of Lake Chamo. Peaceful and relaxing.
Great view but food was expensive.
The bathroom had mold and the floor was dirty.
Food was okay but lacked variety.
One of the best views in Ethiopia.
Lake view was perfect during sunset.
Room was decent but nothing special.
Staff helped with everything we needed.
Service was okay but could be faster.
Resort looks old and needs refurbishing.
Too expensive for the quality offered.
